ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the fax number field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Fax) && NOT(ISNULL(Fax)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Fax)) && !REGEX(Fax ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Fax)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Fax)) && !REGEX(Fax,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for fax number. The minimum number of digits should be 10
